question: Are all <LiKe>, <LeiGu>, and <NaNaQi> animals or humans? A. Animal. B. Human
What are the genders of <LiKe>, <LeiGu>, and <NaNaQi> respectively? A. Girl, boy, girl. B. Boy, girl, boy
What are the hair colors of <LiKe> and <NaNaQi> respectively? A. Blonde, white. B. Black, white
Do <LiKe> and <LeiGu> often wear glasses? A. Yes. B. No
What type of headgear do <LeiGu> and <NaNaQi> often wear? A. Helmet, hat. B. Hat, helmet
